DOC.detailed_description: Given lack evidence support pace self-management patient chronic fatigue syndrome ( CFS ) , examine whether physical behavior health status patient CFS improve response pace self-management program . According power calculation , 36 patient fulfilling 1994 Centre Disease Control Prevention criterion diagnosis chronic fatigue syndrome ( CFS ) randomize either 3 week pace activity self-management relaxation therapy . Both treatment group receive 3 weekly session spread 3 consecutive week . All treatment deliver occupational therapist physiotherapist . One treatment session last 45 minute .
